content.author: vitalikbuterin
content.content:
Check out the deep funding round here!

cryptopond.xyz/modelfactory/…

summary: Vitalik Buterin, co-founder of Ethereum, shared a tweet directing followers to a "deep funding round" at the website cryptopond.xyz. The tweet encourages users to explore the details of this funding initiative, suggesting it may be related to blockchain or cryptocurrency projects. The link provided leads to a section called "modelfactory," which could indicate a focus on innovative or experimental blockchain models.
